message: "A Georgia group is helping survivors of human trafficking turn the pain of their past into symbols of triumph, with a little assistance from tattoo artists."

data.description: ATLANTA (SBG) — A Georgia group is helping survivors of human trafficking turn the pain of their past into symbols of triumph, with a little assistance from tattoo artists. The work they're doing covers up and alters tattoos, signs and scars inflicted upon survivors, using them to create works...
data.title: Human trafficking tattoos are turned into symbols of triumph thanks to Atlanta group
